trigger.Name: maimmenutr
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle()
if Plf then Plf:LimitMaxSpeed(35) Plf:SetExternalPathByName("mm_path1") Plf:SetSkin(7) end
local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() RuleConsole("cinematic_spring_coeff 4")
FlyLinked("mm_campath", PlfID, 68, 0, 0, PlfID) StartCinematic()
PlayCustomMusic("mainmenu")
TActivate("maimmenutr_rail_0") TActivate("maimmenutr_rail_1") TActivate("maimmenutr_rail_2") TActivate("maimmenutr_rail_3") TActivate("maimmenutr_rail_4") TActivate("maimmenutr_rail_5") TActivate("maimmenutr_endway")
trigger:Deactivate()
